exceptions.tactic: destruct (classic (mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x)) as [Hmem | Hnotmem].
exceptions.exn: The reference classic was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x Hin. destruct (classic (mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x)) as [Hmem | Hnotmem]. - left. intros g Hin'. apply expressT'1 in Hmem. apply Hmem. - right. exists x. split; try auto.
